You are here:

SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
ENHANCE YOUR CUSTOMER EXPERIENCE WITH SALESFORCE FEEDBACK MANAGEMENT
Create a Timeline to View Survey Responses

Create a timeline for a Contact record to show survey response details. You can select the fields to show for each timeline entry, and even show fields from other related objects and custom objects.

REQUIRED EDITIONS AND USER PERMISSIONS
Available in: Lightning Experience
Available in: Enterprise, Unlimited, and Developer Editions
Available with the Feedback Management - Starter or Feedback Management - Growth licenses, and IndustriesServiceExcellenceAddOn


USER PERMISSIONS NEEDED
To create a timeline	Read and Create permissions for the objects and fields the timeline uses
From Setup, in the Quick Find box, enter Timeline, and then select Timeline.
Turn on Timeline Configuration.
After you enable Timeline in your org, you can’t disable it.
Click New Timeline.
In the New Timeline window, enter a name for the timeline.
Enter an API name for the timeline or accept the name that's autogenerated.
Select an object to base the timeline on.
You can base your timeline on a standard or custom object. For example, select Contact to show the timeline on a Contact page record.
Save your changes, and then click Next.
To add an object, click Add Related Object.
For Parent Object, select Use Timeline Object.
For Related Object, select Task.
For Field, select WhoId , and then click Next.
Add filter conditions to show records on the timeline, and then click Next.
Specify the values for these fields, and then click Next.
FIELD	VALUE
Title Field	Description
Subtitle Field	Priority
Timestamp	Created Date
Select from these fields the fields that you want to show on the timeline, and then click Add.
Survey NPS Score
Task Details
Response
Status
Created Date
System Modstamp
NOTE In this example, Survey NPS Score, Task Details, and Response are custom fields.
Save and activate the timeline.

Generate a survey invitation link, configure the invitation settings to control your survey's security, and send the invitation to contacts. You can view responses to the survey in the Timeline component in Contact object.

DID THIS ARTICLE SOLVE YOUR ISSUE?
Let us know so we can improve!
Yes
No
title: Create a Survey Timeline with Salesforce Feedback Management
